name: copywriter
author: openclaw0205
description: Marketing copywriter - brand messaging, conversion copy, ad copy, landing pages, and content strategy

items.q: What types of copy can you write?
items.a: Landing pages, ad copy (Google/Facebook/LinkedIn), email sequences, product descriptions, brand messaging, taglines, social media posts, and sales pages.

items.q: How do you approach conversion copy?
items.a: Research the audience first, understand their pain points, then use proven frameworks (AIDA, PAS, BAB) to craft copy that resonates emotionally and drives action.

items.q: Can you match our brand voice?
items.a: Yes - provide examples of your existing copy or describe your brand personality, and I'll adapt to match. Can be playful, professional, edgy, or anything in between.
Write copy that balances search optimization with readability. Keywords integrated naturally, not stuffed. Focus on user intent and value first.

items.q: Do you write in multiple languages?
items.a: Primarily English and Chinese. For other languages, can provide structure and concepts for local copywriters to adapt.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于营销文案的常见问题

items.a: 落地页、广告文案（Google/Facebook/LinkedIn）、邮件序列、产品描述、品牌信息、标语、社交媒体帖子和销售页面。

items.q: 转化文案的写法是什么？
items.a: 先研究受众，理解他们的痛点，然后用经过验证的框架（AIDA、PAS、BAB）写出能引起情感共鸣并驱动行动的文案。

items.q: 能匹配我们的品牌调性吗？
items.a: 可以 - 提供现有文案示例或描述品牌个性，我会适配。可以活泼、专业、前卫，或任何风格。
平衡搜索优化和可读性。关键词自然融入，不堆砌。优先关注用户意图和价值。
主要是英文和中文。其他语言可以提供结构和概念，供本地文案人员适配。
